Dress it up with any of our wing sauces 14.95 $ Hot Honey & Pimento Cheese Chicken Sandwich Crispy fried or char-grilled 15.95 $ Chicken Bacon Ranch Sandwich # Crispy fried or char-grilled 15.95 $ Buffalo Chicken & Blue Cheese Sandwich Crispy fried or char-grilled 15.95 $ Crispy Shrimp Roll Lightly fried & seasoned local shrimp, red pepper coulis toasted split top roll 16.95 $ Local Fresh Fish Sandwich Crispy fried or char grilled. Dress it up with any of our wing sauces 15.95 $ Jumbo All Beef Hot Dog Smothered in chili & cheese 11.95 $ Smoked BBQ Pork Sandwich Low & slow smoked pulled pork in bourbon BBQ sauce, housemade coleslaw 15.95 $ Salads Add to Any Salad Smoked Chicken + 6.00 $ Chicken Tenders + 6.95 $ Shaved Ribeye + 8.00 $ Grilled or Fried Shrimp + 9.00 $ BBQ Pulled Pork 6.95 $ Smoked Chicken Salad 6.95 $ Local Arugula & Red Delicious Apples Candied pecans, blue cheese & lemon honey vinaigrette 11.95 $ gluten free Burger Salad Grilled hamburger, lettuce, tomato, onion, special sauce dressing 13.95 $ Mixed Greens Salad Almonds, bleu cheese crumbles, craisins, balsamic vinaigrette 9.95 $ gluten free, vegetarian Caesar Salad Romaine lettuce, croutons, Caesar dressing 9.95 $ vegetarian Salad Dressings Classic Italian Balsamic Vinaigrette 1000 Island Citrus Honey Vinaigrette Wings Sizes (6) 10.50 $ (12) 21.50 $ (50) 79.50 $ (100) 160.00 $ Carolina Reaper*** South Carolina’s own reaper pepper-flavored wing. Hottest in South Carolina. ***Waiver required*** South Carolina Gold Golden BBQ, sweet & tangy Teriyaki, Hot Teriyaki Soy, sake, mirin glaze make it hot TX Mesquite BBQ Smoky & sweet with a kick OG Buffalo Medium or hot. traditional anchor bar style Buffalo Garlic Romano The best of two worlds MD Old Bay Style Smoky, salty, & peppery with hints of mustard, turmeric Louisiana Cajun Rustic blend of paprika, cayenne & garlic Ranch Dry-rubbed and delicious KY Bourbon Sweet smoky & rich Garlic Romano “Tons” of garlic mixed with buttery & salty pecorino romano Nashville Hot Fiery heat with a touch of sweet Classic Lemon Pepper Zesty & sweet with just the right amount of sour Sweet Thai Chili Starts off sweet, finishes with a kick Add Ons Add to Split Flavors for 12 and Above + 2.00 $ Extra Ranch or Blue Cheese + 0.50 $ Our BCBG burgers are a 1/4 lb. Custom blend of brisket, chuck, and short rib, delivering an exceptionally juicy and flavorful burger experience Single 11.95 | Double 17.95 | Triple 21.95 | Add Carolina Queso Dip +4.95 Burgers & Cheesesteaks 20 Year Griddle Double Patty Melt Double burger patty, caramelized onions, 1000 Island, American cheese, griddled butter bread 18.95 $ NoMtP Quarter Pounder Crispy fried or char-grilled American cheese, red onion, pickles, Duke’s Mayo 14.95 $ Coastal Carolina Cowboy Burger Sweet & sassy BBQ, fried onion ring crispy bacon, grilled onions, pepper Jack cheese 15.95 $ Hot Honey & Bacon Cheeseburger Double patty, crispy bacon, hot honey, caramelized onions pepper Jack cheese 18.95 $ Lowcountry Juicy Lucy Double patty stuffed with housemade pimento cheese 18.95 $ The Belly Buster Burger Double burger patty, fried egg, caramelized onions, crispy bacon American cheese lettuce, tomato, griddled butter bread 19.95 $ Teriyaki Sriracha Ribeye Cheesesteak Grilled onions, American cheese 17.95 $ Loaded Classic Philly Cheesesteak Shaved ribeye, roasted bell peppers, grilled onions, American cheese 16.95 $ Buffalo & Blue Cheesesteak Tangy buffalo, blue cheese crumbles, sauteed onions & bell peppers 17.95 $ BBQ Bacon & Cheddar Cheesesteak Shaved ribeye, tangy KY bourbon BBQ, crispy bacon grilled onions, sharp cheddar cheese 18.95 $ Veggie "Burger" Grilled portobello, roasted red pepper sauce, pepper Jack cheese, lettuce, tomato, pickled red onions 13.95 $ Shareables ESP CO. Top Knot Giant Warm Salted Pretzel Carolina queso & grain mustard 9.95 $ Salsa Roja & Corn Tortilla Chips 6.95 $ Housemade Spinach & Artichoke Dip With tortilla chips 8.95 $ Lowcountry Pimento Cheese With fried saltines 8.95 $ Fried Shrimp Basket Served with cocktail sauce & lemon 6 for 12.95 $ 12 for 23.95 $ 24 for 39.95 $ Carolina “Queso” Dip Carolina Reaper pepper super hot, or regular, tortilla chips 9.95 $ Fried Green Tomatoes Shaved cucumber, pimento cheese, citrus honey vinaigrette 10.95 $ gluten free Fried Chicken Tenders Choice of sauce & crinkle cut french fries 13.95 $ Smoked Chicken or Pulled Pork Quesadilla Loaded with house-smoked chicken or pork, cheddar-tack cheese, sautéed peppers & onions, sour cream, salsa roja 13.95 $ Stacked Nachos Corn tortilla chips smothered with queso, black beans, jalapenos, salsa roja 12.95 $ Add Chili 5.95 $ Add Smoked Chicken 6.95 $ Tater Tots Crispy potato bites served with a choice of dipping sauce 8.95 $ She Crab Fries Crinkle-cut old bay French fries, home-cooked she-crab soup 11.95 $ Each Sides Crinkle Cut Seasoned Fries 5.95 $ Coleslaw 5.95 $ Bacon 5.95 $ Golden Onion Rings 6.95 $ Chopped Small Salad 6.95 $ Fried Okra 6.95 $ Grilled Seasonal Vegetable 6.95 $ Soup Six Mile She Crab Soup Lowcountry staple. Probably the best you’ve ever had 8.95 $ Nate’s Famous Smoked Beef & Bean Chili Low & slow cooked, hearty, sneaky heat, cheddar cheese & onion 7.95 $ All plates are served with a choice of 2 sides Plates Grilled 10 Oz. Hamburger Steak Sautéed onions 17.95 $ Local Fresh Fried or Grilled Fish* Sourced locally & curated by Mount Pleasant’s own 18.95 $ Ditch the sides & stack the tots Totchos Buffalo Chicken “Totchos” Tater tots topped with buffalo sauce, crispy chicken tenders blue cheese crumbles 13.95 $ Chili Cheese “Totchos” Tater tots smothered in Nate's famous beef & bean chili Carolina queso, sour cream & jalapenos 13.95 $ Teriyaki Cheesesteak “Totchos” Tater tots topped with sliced ribeye, covered in Carolina queso teriyaki, sriracha & sesame seeds 16.95 $ Chicken Bacon Ranch “Totchos” Tater tots topped with sliced ribeye, covered in Carolina queso teriyaki, sriracha & sesame seeds 16.95 $ Nashville Hot Honey “Totchos” Tater tots topped with Nashville hot crispy chicken tenders hot honey & housemade pimento cheese 15.95 $ Cocktails BCBG Margarita Astral tequila, lime, agave, salt 9.50 $ Lowcountry Ol’ Fashioned Rye, cinnamon, mole, orange 11.00 $ Wando River Smash Gin, basil, lemon 10.00 $ TG Espresso Martini Cold brew, vodka, tia Maria 11.00 $ Cold Beer on Tap Wicked Weed Brewing Co, “Pernicious” IPA 6.50 $ Miller Lite 4.00 $ Yuengling 5.00 $ Availability is limited Local & Craft Beer Vitamin Sea Brewing, Weymouth, MA, “Clowning Around” Neipa, 6.2% ABV, 16 oz. can 9.50 $ Liability Brewing Company, Greenville, SC, “Stainless Steel Magnolias” Kölsch, 5.0% ABV, 16 oz. can 7.50 $ Creature Comforts Brewing Co., Athens, GA, “Tropicalia” American IPA, 6.6% ABV, 12 oz. can 6.50 $ Carolina Brewery, Chapel Hill, NC, “Sky Blue” Kölsch, 4.8% ABV, 12 oz. can 6.75 $ Bull City Ciderworks, Durham, NC, “OYAH” Orange & hibiscus cider, 6.0% ABV, 12 oz. can 6.75 $ Packaged Beer, Cider & Hard Seltzer Coors Light Lager 4.50 $ Corona Extra Mexican Lager 4.50 $ Heineken 5.00 $ Rolling Rock 4.00 $ Stella Artois 4.50 $ Guinness 20 Oz. can 5.00 $ Negra Modelo Especial 4.50 $ Pabst Blue Ribbon 12 Oz. can 3.50 $ Heineken 0.0 Non-alcoholic 4.00 $ Michelob Ultra 4.25 $ Miller Lite 4.25 $ Bud Light 5.00 $ Budweiser 5.00 $ Corona Light 5.00 $ Sierra Nevada Pale Ale 4.50 $ Truly Hard Seltzer 5.50 $ White Claw Hard Seltzer 5.50 $ Round for The Kitchen Crew 19.00 $ Sometimes the spirit is all you need. All rocks & neat pours are 2 ounces. Subject to availability. The Good Stuff Four Roses Single barrel, barrel strength bourbon 22.00 $ Buffalo Trace Bourbon 12.00 $ Blanton’s Single Barrel Bourbon 17.00 $ E.H. Taylor Small batch bourbon 14.00 $ Elijah Craig Barrel proof bourbon 14.00 $ Bardstown “Discovery series”, bourbon 25.00 $ Heaven Hill 7 Year, bottled-in-bond, bourbon 13.00 $ Henry McKenna 10 Year, bottled-in-bond, bourbon 13.00 $ Jack Daniels Bonded, TN whiskey (whiskey of the year winner) 15.00 $ Larceny Barrel proof, bourbon 15.00 $ I.W. Harper Bourbon 12.00 $ Michters 10 year, rye 29.00 $ Sazerac Rye 7.50 $ Casamigos Reposado, tequila 11.00 $ Casamigos Blanco, tequila 9.00 $ Wine by The Glass Rosé, “Sabine”, Bieler et Fils, Coteaux d’Aix Provence 10.00 $ Sauvignon Blanc, Oyster Bay, Marlborough, New Zealand 9.50 $ Pinot Grigio, MezzaCorona, Delle Venezie, Italy 9.50 $ Chardonnay, Wente, California 9.50 $ Pinot Noir, Primarus, Oregon 10.00 $ Cabernet Sauvignon, Bogle, California 9.00 $ Malbec, Terrazas de los Andes, Mendoza, Argentina 9.50 $ Sangria Red or white 8.00 $ House Wines Varietals may vary Red or white 5.75 $ Zero Proof CBD Seltzers High Rise D9 Pineapple CBD Seltzer 9.00 $ High Rise D9 Raspberry CBD Seltzer 8.00 $ Choice of main item, French fries, fruit, juice box, & rice krispy treat Kiddie Combo Trays Ballpark Hot Dog 9.95 $ Hand Breaded Fried Chicken Tenders 9.95 $ Mini Smashburger 9.95 $ Grilled American Cheese 9.95 $ Mac & Cheese 9.95 $ Plain Quesadilla 9.95 $ Mini Carolina Wild Rice Bowl 9.95 $ Mains Are Availble a La Carte 6.95 $ Kiddie Drinks Shirley Temple 1.95 $ Electric Lemonade 1.95 $ Arnie Palmer Jr. 1.95 $ Juice Box 1.95 $ Kiddie Minis Fruit 1.95 $ Rice Krispy Treat 1.95 $ French Fries 1.95 $ Ice Cream Sandwich 1.95 $ Kids meals are for children 11 and under. Please inform your server of any food allergies. Carolina’s own reaper pepper flavored wing. Hottest in SC ***waiver required*** South Carolina Gold Golden BBQ, sweet & tangy TX Mesquite BBQ Smoky & sweet with a kick Louisiana Cajun Rustic blend of paprika, cayenne & garlic MD Old Bay Style Smoky, salty, & peppery with hints of mustard, turmeric KY Bourbon Sweet smoky & rich Teriyaki Soy, sake, mirin glaze *Make It Hot + 1.00 $ OG Buffalo Medium or hot. traditional anchor bar style Garlic Romano “Tons” of garlic mixed with buttery & salty pecorino romano Classic Lemon Pepper Zesty & sweet with just the right amount of sour Wings 30 53.00 $ 40 69.00 $ 60 105.00 $ 120 160.00 $ Serves 4 to 6 people Soup Six Mile She Crab Soup Lowcountry staple. Probably the best you’ve ever had 38.00 $ Cooper River Broccoli & Cheddar Soup A hearty "stick to your ribs" winter specialty 7.95 $ Each serves 4 to 6 people Sides Crinkle Cut French Fries 18.95 $ Golden Onion Rings 19.95 $ Side Garden Salad 19.95 $ Baked Beans 18.95 $ Fried Okra 18.95 $ Coleslaw 18.95 $ Bacon 18.95 $ Potato Salad 18.95 $ Nate’s Red Rice 18.95 $ Chips & Salsa 19.95 $ All boxed lunch handhelds are served with a choice of 2: crinkle-cut french fries, housemade potato chips, fried okra. $14.95 each Boxed Individual Lunches Double Stack Smash Burger All beef patty, LTO, choice of cheese: American, Swiss, cheddar or pepper jack Add Bacon or Chili + 1.50 $ Add Wisconsin Cheese Dip + 3.95 $ Loaded Philly Cheesesteak Shaved ribeye, roasted bell peppers, grilled onions, american cheese Carolina Reaper Chicken Sandwich Lettuce, tomato, ranch, provolone Buffalo Chicken Sandwich Lettuce, tomato, ranch or blue cheese Nashville Hot Chicken Sandwich Lettuce, tomato, ranch, pickle Smoked BBQ Pork Sandwich Low & slow smoked pulled pork Grilled Chicken Wrap LTO, provolone Carolina Reaper Fish Sandwich Lettuce, tomato, pickle Buffalo Fish Sandwich Lettuce, tomato, ranch or blue cheese Nashville Hot Fish Sandwich Lettuce, tomato, ranch, pickle Rivertown Wild Musroom Fajita Wrap Artichoke, mixed greens, roasted peppers, grilled onions, salsa roja, shredded cheese Impossible Burger LTO, choice of cheese: American, Swiss, cheddar or pepperjack Choose 1 protein $16.95 each Salad Bowls Add to Any Salad Smoked Chicken Chicken Tenders Steak Salmon Grilled or Fried Shrimp Burger Salad (No additions) grilled hamburger, lettuce, tomato, onion, special sauce dressing Mixed Greens Salad Almonds, goat cheese, craisins, balsamic vinaigrette Chef’s Salad Iceberg lettuce, bacon, lettuce, tomato, ham, turkey, balsamic vinaigrette Caesar Salad Romaine lettuce, croutons, Caesar dressing Executive Chef: Nate Howard, Six Mile, Mount Pleasant Order Online Email Signup Email
